original_title: L'anno prossimo vado a letto alle dieci
overview: This rollicking Italian black comedy follows the hellish, bizarre New Year's Eve night of two average guys who find themselves stumbling from one outlandish situation to the next. After being dumped by his girlfriend, a man tags along to the party his friend is attending, leading to a series of misadventures.
title: L'anno prossimo vado a letto alle dieci
